$gdc-t-display-s-bol.description:
40px - Bold |
display-S-bold
________________________
As the largest text on the screen, display styles are reserved for short, most important text or numerals. They work best on dashboard summary number.

$gdc-t-display-s-med.description:
40px - Medium |
display-S-medium
__________________________
As the largest text on the screen, display styles are reserved for short, most important text or numerals. They work best on dashboard summary number.

$gdc-t-display-s-reg.description:
40px - Regular| 
display-S-regular
__________________________
As the largest text on the screen, display styles are reserved for short, most important text or numerals. They work best on dashboard summary number.

$gdc-t-head-xl-bol.description:
36px - Bold |
headline-XL-bold
___________________________
Headlines are best-suited for short, high-emphasis text 

such as title of a page or number in dashboard which less emphasis than Display type

There are 4 type sets (XL, L,M,S)

$gdc-t-head-l-bol.description:
32px - Bold |
headline-L-bold
___________________________
Headlines are best-suited for short, high-emphasis text 

such as title of a page or number in dashboard which less emphasis than Display type

There are 4 type sets (XL, L,M,S)

$gdc-t-head-m-bol.description:
28px - Bold |
headline-M-bold
___________________________
Headlines are best-suited for short, high-emphasis text 

such as title of a page or number in dashboard which less emphasis than Display type

There are 4 type sets (XL, L,M,S)

$gdc-t-head-m-reg.description:
28px - Regular |
headline-M-Regular
___________________________
Headlines are best-suited for short, high-emphasis text 

such as title of a page or number in dashboard which less emphasis than Display type

There are 4 type sets (XL, L,M,S)

$gdc-t-head-s-bol.description:
24px - Bold |
headline-S-bold
___________________________
Headlines are best-suited for short, high-emphasis text 

such as title of a page or number in dashboard which less emphasis than Display type

There are 4 type sets (XL, L,M,S)

$gdc-t-tittle-xl-bol.description:
22px - Bold |
title-XL-bold
__________________________
Titles are smaller than headline styles, and should be used for medium-emphasis text 
Such as section title, sub title, popup title, table title, chart title...
There are 4 type sets (XL,L,M,S)

$gdc-t-tittle-l-bol.description:
20px - Bold |
title-L-bold
__________________________
Titles are smaller than headline styles, and should be used for medium-emphasis text 
Such as section title, sub title, popup title, table title, chart title...
There are 4 type sets (XL,L,M,S)

$gdc-t-tittle-l-reg.description:
20px - Regular |
title-L-regular
__________________________
Titles are smaller than headline styles, and should be used for medium-emphasis text 
Such as section title, sub title, popup title, table title, chart title...
There are 4 type sets (XL,L,M,S)

$gdc-t-tittle-m-bol.description:

title-M-bold
__________________________
Titles are smaller than headline styles, and should be used for medium-emphasis text

$gdc-t-tittle-s-bol.description:
16px - Bold |
title-S-bold
__________________________
Titles are smaller than headline styles, and should be used for medium-emphasis text 
Such as section title, sub title, popup title, table title, chart title...
There are 4 type sets (XL,L,M,S)

$gdc-t-comp-l-bol.description:
16px - Bold |
component-L-bold
________________________
Using for text inside large component 

such as button, menu, tab, lnb,gnb,chips,text field, drop down, date pciker, steps...

$gdc-t-comp-l-reg.description:
16px - Regular |
component-L-regular
________________________
Using for text inside large component 

such as button, menu, tab, lnb,gnb,chips,text field, drop down, date pciker, steps...

$gdc-t-comp-m-bol.description:
14px - Bold |
component-M-bold
________________________
Using for text inside medium component 

such as button, menu, tab, lnb,gnb,chips,text field, drop down, date pciker, steps...

$gdc-t-comp-m-med.description:

component-M-medium
________________________

such as button, menu, tab, lnb,gnb,chips,text field, drop down, date pciker, steps...

$gdc-t-comp-m-reg.description:
14px - Regular |
component-M-regular
________________________
Using for text inside medium component 

such as button, menu, tab, lnb,gnb,chips,text field, drop down, date pciker, steps...

$gdc-t-comp-s-bol.description:
12px - Bold |
component-S-bold
________________________
Using for text inside small component 

such as button, menu, tab, lnb,gnb,chips,text field, drop down, date pciker, steps...

$gdc-t-comp-s-reg.description:
12px - Regular |
component-S-regular
________________________
Using for text inside small component 

such as button, menu, tab, lnb,gnb,chips,text field, drop down, date pciker, steps...

$gdc-t-body-m-bol.description:
14px - Bold |
body-M-bold
________________________
Use for information content 
with higher emphasis than Medium & Regular 

Using when text is:
- Information content such as data table content, pop up content, chart content, card content

$gdc-t-body-m-med.description:
14 - Medium |
body-M-medium
________________________
Use for information content 

with higher emphasis than Regular 
Using when text is:
- Information content such as data table content, pop up content, chart content, card content

$gdc-t-body-m-reg.description:
14px - Regular |
body-M-regular
________________________
Using when text is:
- Information content such as data table content, pop up content, chart content, card content

$gdc-t-body-s-bol.description:
12px - Bold |
body-S-bold
_____________________
Using for smaller content such as chart label, legend

$gdc-t-body-s-reg.description:
12px - Regular |
body-S-regular
_____________________
Using for smaller content such as chart label, legend

14px - Regular |
link-M-regular
_______________________
use for text link

$gdc-t-link-s-reg.description:
12px - Regular |
link-S-regular
_______________________
use for text link smaller than M
